title: Multilingual Wordle
subtitle: Portfolio Project
cardDescription: A multilingual homage to the popular word-guessing game. The app supports both left-to-right and right-to-left languages such as Arabic and Persian.
fullDescription:
I love language and wanted to create a version of Wordle in multiple languages.

This React app uses a translation provider to update content dynamically. The current setup uses an external API and Tanstack React Query to fetch a solution, while other languages use a static word list. The app supports both left-to-right and right-to-left languages.

To help manage translations and supported languages, I used TypeScript to enforce strict typing with the SupportedLang type, ensuring only valid language codes are used throughout the application and reducing the risk of runtime errors when handling multilingual features.
